issues.title: {{PROJECT_NAME}} Initial Setup
issues.description: Complete Python project setup with virtual environment, testing, and linting.

issues.title: Configure Python virtual environment
issues.description:
Set up Python development environment:
- Create virtual environment with uv or venv
- Install project in editable mode: `uv pip install -e '.[dev]'`
- Verify Python version >= 3.10
- Document activation command in README

issues.title: Create Python package structure
issues.description:
Create standard Python package layout:
- src/{{PROJECT_SLUG}}/__init__.py
- src/{{PROJECT_SLUG}}/main.py
- tests/__init__.py
- tests/test_main.py
- Verify imports work correctly

issues.title: Configure pytest testing
issues.description:
Set up pytest for testing:
- Verify pytest configuration in pyproject.toml
- Create first passing test in tests/test_main.py
- Run `pytest` and confirm it passes
- Add pytest-cov for coverage reports

issues.title: Configure linting and formatting
issues.description:
Set up code quality tools:
- Configure ruff for linting and formatting
- Configure mypy for type checking
- Run `ruff check .` and fix any issues
- Run `mypy src/` and fix any issues
- Add pre-commit hooks (optional)

issues.title: Configure GitHub Actions CI
issues.description:
Set up continuous integration:
- Create .github/workflows/ci.yml
- Run tests on push and PR
- Run linting (ruff) and type checking (mypy)
- Test on Python 3.10, 3.11, 3.12
- Add status badge to README

issues.title: Implement first working feature
issues.description:
Build the first functional feature:
- Implement core functionality in src/{{PROJECT_SLUG}}/
- Write tests for the feature
- Ensure all tests pass
- Update documentation
